nodes.text: Something to Mull Over is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign, more specifically it ties into the Open Aarms adventure. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 3, 2003 and took the form of an excerpt from the travel log of Jaan Bluum describing the cochlera, a creature native to Genarius. This is supplemented with an out-of-universe description and roleplaying statistics for the creature.
